pages.text: Make a Reservation View Menus Join Our Loyalty Program Offering the Best Brasserie Cuisine in Charleston 39 Rue de Jean is a refined French Cafe and Bar reminiscent of a late 1800â€™s Brasserie. Our menu features Parisian-inspired classics, custom cocktails, and a tailored selection of wines. You will feel as though you are in a traditional French Brasserie when you dine at Rue de Jean, with a neighborhood feel that will transport you to Paris! 39 Rue de Jean offers robust selections, with hearty classics and lighter fare, as well as elegant craft cocktails, an extensive wine and beer list, and jubilant socializing. Contact us at 843-725-5959 ext 1 or through the link below Follow Us Private Events The Upstairs at Rue event space offers a private dining room that can be transformed to host professional gatherings or celebratory affairs, accommodating up to 200 guests. This unique space, overlooking Upper King street, features vaulted ceilings, exposed brick and a private entrance. Download Info Packet Inquire Now Give the gift of delicious cuisine. Purchase Gift Cards Contact Us OPEN FOR PICKUP, INDOOR AND OUTDOOR DINING 39 John Street Charleston, SC 29403 Operating Hours: Dinner Monday-Thursday 4:00 pm-10:00pm Friday & Saturday 4:00pm-11:00pm Sunday 4:00pm-9:00pm Brunch & Lunch Monday-Sunday 11:30 am-3:00 pm Phone: (843) 722-8881 Email Us See our news, reviews, and happenings.
